Posts.Content: Grandma-Diann wrote: I have been dealing with lymphadema of the arm  for over 6 mths.  Now all of a sudden my breast is swelling and extremely painful.  They have removed fluid 3 times.  Does anyone have any suggestions of how to bring down the swelling and lessen the pain? Dx 6/11/2011, 5cm, Stage II, Grade 3, 0/6 nodes, ER+, HER2+ Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: Lymphadema Grandma-Diann Kicks

Posts.Content: Dec 12, 2016 07:55PM Diann wrote: I have been a survivor for 12 years & the Breast Cancer has returned in my bones. Thought I was Scott free but IT'S BACK. Dx in June 2016 - did 3 months of radiation everyday. It was tough but, doable now I'm on Afinitor & Aromasin daily, once a month infusions of Zometa - have lots of pain bu I'm here to talk about it & to fight this disease once again.
Posts.Title: Bone/joint pain JudyKRN Key2
